title: Detective Conan: Shadows of Greed
premise: In the quiet streets of London, a deadly robbery turns into a complex murder investigation led by the legendary Detective Conan. As greed and violence collide, only Conan's keen mind can unravel the mystery.

shotlist.description: A dark, rainy night in London, the camera pans over a quiet residential area, setting a moody atmosphere.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A dark rainy night, wet streets reflecting street lights, houses lining a quiet suburban road in London, atmosphere filled with tension.

voice_over.text: A silent night shattered by greed...

shotlist.description: A group of shadowy figures, armed and masked, quietly approach a house, tension palpable.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Shadowy figures with masks and dark clothing, equipped with knives and a BB gun, stealthily approaching a suburban house at night.

voice_over.text: A meticulously planned robbery takes a deadly turn.

shotlist.description: Inside the house, a man, Olsi Kuka, is suddenly awakened as the robbers burst into his bedroom.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A terrified man in bed, abruptly woken, as armed robbers break into his dimly lit bedroom.

voice_over.text: Caught in his sanctuary, his fate sealed by his past deeds...

shotlist.description: The chaos ensues with a violent struggle, the robbers attacking Kuka, who tries to defend himself.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Intense struggle in a bedroom, a man defending himself against attackers wielding knives, room in disarray.

voice_over.text: A struggle for life, a fight for ill-gotten gains.

shotlist.description: Flashback to Detective Conan analyzing the crime scene, piecing together clues with his magnifying glass.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Young detective with a magnifying glass inspecting a crime scene, focused expression, evidence tags around the room.

voice_over.text: But every crime leaves a trace...

shotlist.description: Intense courtroom scene, the accused robbers facing judgment, their expressions a mix of defiance and fear.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: A tense courtroom scene, defendants looking anxious, a judge and lawyers present, the atmosphere charged.

shotlist.description: Conan, in a dark alley, confronting one of the suspects, determination in his eyes.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Confrontation in a dimly lit alley, a young detective facing a nervous suspect, both under a flickering street lamp.

voice_over.text: Tell me what happened that night!

shotlist.description: A high-speed chase through the streets of London, Conan on the tail of a suspect.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: High-speed chase at night, detective on a motorcycle pursuing a speeding car through London’s streets.

shotlist.description: Conan and his team analyzing digital maps and surveillance footage, a breakthrough moment.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: High-tech crime lab, team of detectives around digital screens showing maps and video footage, moment of discovery.

voice_over.text: Every piece brings us closer to the truth.

shotlist.description: A suspenseful reveal, a hidden room behind a bookcase filled with evidence linking the suspects.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Secret room behind a bookcase, filled with bags of drugs and stacks of cash, crucial evidence.

voice_over.text: What lies hidden will always come to light...

shotlist.description: The final confrontation, Conan facing off against the mastermind in a dimly lit warehouse.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Dramatic showdown in a dimly lit warehouse, young detective standing resolute against a cunning adversary.

shotlist.description: A montage of action sequences, fights, chases, and critical clues, building up the excitement.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Rapid montage of action sequences, fights, car chases, and glimpses of clues, high-energy and thrilling.

voice_over.text: In a world where shadows rule, only the sharp mind of Detective Conan can light the way.

shotlist.description: The trailer ends with the movie title and release date, suspenseful music in the background.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Dramatic display of the movie title 'Detective Conan: Shadows of Greed' with a release date, suspenseful background music.

voice_over.text: The truth awaits, in cinemas soon.
